channel.title: Search on Radio4000 Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Search on Radio4000 Blog

item.title: Search tracks, listen to results
item.description: Hello! Today a new feature appears on the site, tracks search. On top of now being able to search any radio tracks, and find the one you want to play, you can from today listen to a selection of tracks from a radio. Fig 1. playing selection “#after” from Radio Tobha That’s right, you can try it now, go to any radio (of course, yours too!), and explore the list of tracks.
